resources.string:
Hi, my name is Ardi 

I Love fish. 

The kind that is alive and swims around in a aquarium or river, or a lake, and definitely the ocean. 
Fun fact is that I have several aquariums and also river. 

I like eating fish too. Raw fish. Grilled fish. Smoked fish. Poached fish - not so much. 
And sometimes I event go fishing. 
And even less sometimes, I actually catch something. 

Once, when I was camping in Canada, and very hungry, I even caught a large salmon with my hands.
